overview:
Steve Fulling has always enjoyed the people side of business & technology. He believes that people are what make things happen. Technology enables. He states that he has never seen poor results come from a well coached team.

Some of the things he is most proud of in his career:

  • Watching members of his team become VP’s, CTO’s and CIO’s.
  • Transforming a monopolistic utility into a profitable, product-centered business.
  • Being a member of the executive team who produced $500M in shareholder value.
  • Having a 360-degree A+ track record going back 20+ years.
  • Having the courage to leave his W2 job and start a business.

He enjoys most finding the intersections between complex human and business spaces and executing the opportunities they present.
